body.raw:
# Privacy Policy ## 1.Information We Collect: 1. Personal Information: Name, email, and location 2. Wallet Transaction Data: Used for internal processing only. 3. User-Generated Content: Event posts, photos, and comment ## 2.How We Use Your Information: 1. Provide and improve our service.
2. Personalise user experience.
3. Facilitate event-related activities.
4. Conduct internal wallet transactions. ## 3.Information Sharing: 1. With Event Organisers: User information may be shared to facilitate event organisation.
2. With Other Users: Sharing event memories, including photos and comments.
3. Wallet transaction data is securely stored and not shared with external parties. ## 4.Data Security: Industry-standard security measures are employed to protect user data, including wallet transactions. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure. ## 5.User Control and Data Management 1. Users can edit account information and preferences.
2. Users can choose to delete their account ## 6.Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns about our Terms and Privacy Policy, please contact us at [insert-mail-here].
